title: Freedom Memories
overview: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing and Chai Hing-chau are eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Programs. In their pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue, among others. Hing-chau struggles to fulfill his ambitions as he's constantly passed over for roles. Tak-wing becomes an overnight sensation with his most recent role. As their career trajectories go in different directions, their paths continue to inexplicably intersect. As life would have it, their love lives would also take a turn. Tak-wing always has the biggest crush on Chi-ngan's elder sister Keung Chi-yin. Eventually, he realized his true feelings is with Chi-ngan all along. When Hing-chau finally gets his break with his slapstick comedy routine, his career skyrockets but his relationship with Chor-yue becomes as fragile as ever. To make matters even worse, a feud over contract renewals push Tak-wing and Hing- chau to the tipping point of ending their friendship...
